Name: Faith
About the game: Welcome to Faith! a new survival first person, exploration game where you can go explore your whereabouts, check the highest mountain, swim across the shores, but when night comes, you will have to escape into your trusty spaceship to escape extreme storms, use the resources and knowledge from the past day you prepare for the next one. As you progress through the game you figure out more of your story and how you arrived here.
Meta Title: Faith: Dec 27, 2021, AP Developing and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Faith? Check out the release date (Dec 27, 2021), developer insights from AP Developing, and a complete game summary.
